net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary
Interface SimpleItinerary

All Superinterfaces:
Itinerary
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseCircularItinerary, BaseCircularTaskItinerary, BaseItinerary, BaseRandomItinerary, BaseTaskItinerary
public interface SimpleItinerary
extends Itinerary

A simple itinerary type. It extends the itinerary adding facilities to insert/remove destinations in the itinerary.

Version:
1.0 14/9/2005
Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net

Method Detail

addNextDestination

boolean addNextDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI)
Add another destination to the collection of destinations of this itinerary.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the string that represents the destination to add. It should be something like an URL, but using a string avoids dealing with exceptions.
Returns:
true if the destination has been added to the itinerary, false otherwise.

addNextDestination

boolean addNextDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                           int index)
Add another destination to the collection of destinations of this itinerary, specifying the position of the destination in the list of destinations.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination to be added
index - the position to insert the destination
Returns:
true if the destination is added, false otherwise.

addNextDestination

boolean addNextDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                           java.lang.String previousDestinationURI)
Adds another destination to the collection of destination of this itinerary. The added destination is inserted just after the specified previous destination.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination to add.
previousDestinationURI - the destination that must be previous the one added.
Returns:
true if the destination is added, false otherwise.

addNextDestinationIfNotDuplicated

boolean addNextDestinationIfNotDuplicated(java.lang.String destinationURI)
Adds the specified destination to the destination list only if it is not already contained in the itinerary (i.e., only if there is not a destination equal to this one).

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination to add.
Returns:
true if the destination has been added, false otherwise.

removeDestination

boolean removeDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI)
Removes a specific destination address from the collection of destinations of this itinerary.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination address to remove.
Returns:
true if the destination has been removed, false otherwise.

removeDestinationAt

boolean removeDestinationAt(int index)
Removes the destination of order .

Parameters:
index - the number of the destination to be removed.
Returns:
true if the destination is removed, false otherwise.
